titleStmt.title: A mery gest how a sergeau[n]t woldel erne [sic] to be a frere
titleStmt.author: More, Thomas, Sir, Saint, 1478-1535.

publicationStmt.publisher: By me Iulyan Notary dwelly[n]g in Powlys churche yarde at the weste dore at the sygne of saynt Marke,

notesStmt.note: Printer's name and address from colophon; publication date conjectured by STC.
Reproduction of a photostat of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: Powlys churche yarde at the weste dore at the sygne of saynt Marke
